result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Trevon S Reid

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Trevon S Reid in court with attorney Jessica L Schuster.  Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Called at 9:04 am  Cases called 17CM187, 16CM155, 17CM119 and 16TR871.  17CM187 Ct 1 plea, Ct 2 DRI, Ct 3 plea.  17CM119 Ct 1 DRI, Ct 2 DRI Ct 3 plea  16CM155 DRI case.  Sentence withheld probation 18 months.  No DNA sample.  Restitution $59.50  Additonal conditions.  16TR871 County moves to dismissed.  Plea agreement stated on record.  Def agrees to plea agreement as stated.  Plea advisement form completed and reviewed.  17CM187 Ct 1 Guilty plea & Ct 3 Guilty plea  17CM119 Ct 3 guilty plea  Dismiss read in Ct 2 17CM187  17CM119 DRI Ct 1 & 2.  16CM155 DRI.  16TR871 dismissed.   Constitutional rights reviewed and right to jury trial.  Elements reviewed.  Pleas entered freely & voluntarily.  Facts reviewed.  Factual basis to accept pleas.  Pleas accepted and found guilty  17CM187 Ct 1 & 3 and 17CM119 Ct 3.  State presents sentencing arguments.  17CM119 Credit of 2 days if revoked.  17CM187 17 days jail credit for ct 3.  Sentencing arguments by Atty Schuster. Brief statement by def.  Sentencing remarks by Court.  Court will accept plea agreement.  17CM187 Ct 1 - Sentence withheld, probation 18 months.  Concurrent. Cost only DNA surcharge.  Complete on line class retail theft course.  Full time employment or school for 35 hr per wk. or combination of both.  Counseling.  Restitution $59.50.  Bond in 17CM119 to be applied towards rest.  Ct 3 17 days jail, completed.  Cost, waive DNA surcharge.  17CM119  Ct 3 Sentence withheld 18 months probaiton,  Concurrent.  Cost plus Dna surcharge.  same conditions in 17CM187  Letter of apology to Offier May.  Credit of 2 days if revoked on 17CM119.  Credit of 17 days on 17CM187.    If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered, without further order of the court, against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.   Post conviction.  Court cost on Ct  3 in 17CM187 payment plan.   Any outstanding fines court will start new with payment plan for these    Victim rights complied with.

Defendant Trevon S Reid in court, in custody and via video   Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court calls  @ 1:33 pm.  Court gives history of case. Def has been in custody since 1-9-17 on failure to pay commitments. Court reviews what half would be is $802.99.  Def. didn't get D.L.  Def. advised to contact public defender.  Court vacates warrant.  Court will reinstate signature bond. Def. would like p.p. renewed. Court questions def. Court will review all commitments on 2-1-17 @ 10:00 will put him on video.  Status conference scheduled for February 13, 2017 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Trevon S Reid not in court.  Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls  @ 1:25 pm.  Case was set for status cnf yesterday and def. didn't appear.  State request warrant $200.00 cash. Court authorize warrant $200.00 cash bond.

Defendant Trevon S Reid in court.  Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Cases called 16CM155 and 16TR871.  Called at 11:06 a.m.   Statement by Atty Constable.  Requesting an adjournment with conditions, will not revoke offer at this time.  Court has questions for def.  Response  by def.  Status conference scheduled for January 9, 2017 at 03:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on January 3, 2017 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Trevon S Reid not in court.  Galen Bayne-Allison appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls 16CM155 & 16TR871 @ 3:15 pm. Def. appeared earlier today.  Matter resolved. Send notices  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 3, 2017 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Trevon S Reid in court.  Galen Bayne-Allison appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls 16CM155 & 16TR871  @ 9:04 a.m.    Def. will represent himself.  Court enters Not Guilty plea to both cases.  Bond continues.  Status conference scheduled for October 18, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Trevon S Reid
Current: 130 1/2 Lincoln St, Antigo, WI 54409 United States  (Effective: 08-23-2016)
Prior: 134 Lincoln Street, Antigo, WI 54409

Defendant Trevon S Reid in court.  Galen Bayne-Allison appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls  @ 9:44 am.    Def. has copy of complaint, advised of charges and penalties.  Def. given atty rights and given options. State heard on bond.  Court orders $500  Signature bond.  Court now calls 16TR861 & 16TR871 @ 9:48 am.  16TR861 Dismiss wrong DOB & 16TR871 To follow 16CM155  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 20, 2016 at 09:00 am.
